00001 package modelManagement.simulink;
00002 
00003 import org.junit.Test;
00004 import static org.junit.Assert.*;
00005 
00006 public class SystemLayouter {
00007 
00008     final Integer distanceBetweenPorts          = new Integer(60);
00009     final Integer distanceBetweenSystmes        = new Integer(90);
00010     final Integer blockSizeHoriz                = new Integer(250);
00011     final Integer blockSizeVert                         = new Integer(100);
00012     final Integer portSizeHoriz                 = new Integer(30);
00013     final Integer portSizeVert                  = new Integer(14);
00014 
00015     private Integer top     = new Integer(40);
00016     private Integer left    = new Integer(35);
00017     private Integer bottom  = new Integer(0);
00018     private Integer right   = new Integer(0);
00019 
00020         public void startWithSystems() {
00021         top    = 40;
00022         left   = -140;
00023         }
00024 
00025         public void startWithOutports() {
00026         left = left + distanceBetweenSystmes + blockSizeHoriz;
00027         if (left < 0) {left = 100; }
00028         top = 50;
00029         }
00030 
00031         public String nextPort() {
00032         top = top + distanceBetweenPorts;
00033         bottom = top + portSizeVert;
00034         right = left + portSizeHoriz;
00035         String position = buildPositionString();         
00036                 return position;
00037         }
00038 
00039         public String nextSystem() {
00040         left = left + distanceBetweenSystmes + blockSizeHoriz;
00041         bottom = top + blockSizeVert;
00042         right = left + blockSizeHoriz;
00043         String position = buildPositionString();
00044                 return position;
00045         }
00046 
00047         private String buildPositionString() {
00048                 String format = "[%d %d %d %d]";
00049                 String position = String.format(format, left, top, right, bottom);
00050                 return position;
00051         }
00052 
00053         @Test
00054         public void testBuildPositionString() {
00055                 SystemLayouter sl = new SystemLayouter();
00056                 String pos = sl.buildPositionString();
00057                 assertTrue(pos.equalsIgnoreCase("[20 50 0 0]"));
00058         } 
00059 
00060 }
